ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) jar crunchy peanut butter, divided
1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (12 ounce) jar hot fudge ice cream topping, divided
1 (12 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping, divided

cookingTips: Keep ice cream sandwiches frozen until assembly moment; work quickly so they don't melt
Prepare pudding without milk per package directions for a thicker, mousse-like consistency
Freeze between layers if possible to maintain structure; at minimum, keep refrigerated until serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide assembly of no-bake ice cream dessert with proper layering and cooling to maintain structure.
